website_summaries.verdict: An innovative concept that perfectly suits some tasks, but the overall build is not rugged enough for heavy-duty projects.
pros: Built-in marking feature helps draw straight lines while measuring
Marking feature helps for projects such as measuring drywall and marking lines
cons: Measurements aren't as accurate as other models

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This measurer was nice but did not last long. The first time that got pulled out to 23 ft. It got stuck and could not be put back into the dispenser. Never fell or got banged up so this boggled my mind. Definitely would not invest in this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My go-to measuring tape. The tape lock is pretty stiff to lock. But that's fine. It doesn't slip once locked. I didn't think I would use the pencil marking feature much, but I really have. It is most useful for determining the middle of a long piece of wood for a cut. I dial it in to what I think the middle should be, then mark from both ends. The actual middle is between my two marks. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M Hulse

customer_reviews.title: can’t use for inside measurements
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad unit but while I like this tape, I can’t use it for inside measurements. Was ripping some boards on the table saw and using it to measure placement of the fence. After a few cuts my son measured one of the boards and found it to be roughly a 16th to wide. Checked all that had been cut and found the same. Couldn’t figure out what was going on until I grabbed my older tape, made a cut, and the width was accurate. Like the tape, but having to always grab a different tape was to much so this one will unfortunately collect dust on the workbench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Tons of room on the packing card for instructions, but all that space is used to tell us what wonderful piece of trash this is - not a single word about how to use the Self Marking feature THE ONLY REASON I BOUGHT IT! It still functions as a tape measure.........too bad I have absolutely no use for another tape measure. Next time I'll go with a name brand like Stanley.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and exceptional value. Nice wide tape with clear easy to read metric graduations. The built in marking device takes a bit to get used to but it does work and, once you're accustomed to it, saves time and increases accuracy. It's a great addition to any tool belt and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Who?

customer_reviews.title: 5M (Metric) QUICKDRAW PRO Self Marking Tape Measure
customer_reviews.text: Good day ! I have the second such measuring tape.. The first worked for 7 months in very harsh conditions. Frankly I was not sorry she honorably fulfilled his duty. Price-quality is quite justified. Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tape
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky but nice. I was sick of my cheapo HF tapes tipping over during shop layout so I bought this bcs it can stand on its own AND hopefully, it's hook is accurately calibrated. --- Of course, I could have just glued a wide base on my HF tapes but I'm also tired of starting measurements mid-tape to get repeatable results so this little guy is great so far :-) Built-in pencil is sly. Maybe I'll love it when I get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I’m a contractor always loosing or misplacing my pencil. I wasted too much time finding and sharpening my pencil this tool is great! Take your measurements lick it in and scribe your material. Easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: SLN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hubs loves this tape measure! Gold star for me from the hubs!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Chapman

customer_reviews.title: The robust and easy to use its function of placing the marks.
customer_reviews.text: very good product, robust, the function of marking with its tips is very useful and presisa.cumplio with my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Mendez

customer_reviews.title: But she is happy with the measuring tape part of it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom. She loves it, but has a bit of a hard time using the graphite marker part of it, she says it's hit or miss. Which is a shame because that's the reason I got it for her. But she is happy with the measuring tape part of it, so it's not a total loss and maybe we'll figure out how to use the graphite marker part eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Betti726

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: shortly after I began to use it the "clamp" for holding the blade at the desired measurement became finicky and would not always hold the blade. Then this weekend the hold failed with the blade out at approx 8ft, it recoiled and tore the hook off the end, so now useless, and of course it's probably just run out of warranty. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Ian J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TAPE MEASURE
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to my husband who loved it! Said he will get many years of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: DonnaD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband since finding a pencil often holds up the starting of a job!
customer_reviews.author: Randi H

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Tape worked just as I seen in the advertisement. I gave it 4 stars because I am old school and just had a hard time getting use to it. I ended up just using a pencil most of the time because I forgot it was self marking. I am sure this would be a great item for your DYI person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: After three days on a commercial construction job, the blade was weakened. It wouldn’t stand out more than a foot without curling. Great concept just not made for heavy everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tool that is a real bargain
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Facebook and thought it would be a cool Christmas gift for our son in law. After I received it I think I'll have to buy him another one. This is a well built 25' tape measure that is easy to read and the built in pencil is a fantastic idea. I wasn't sure how the marking part would work but after trying it I can't figure out why no one made this when I did construction work. No telling how many pencils I've lost over the years
customer_reviews.author: bjcj7422

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design
customer_reviews.text: This item broke within 15 minutes of usage. EXTREMELY fragile tape wrecks itself rewinding to the holder. May be fine for tiny in-home usage but I can't see how.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this tape measurer because it was hard to click it to stay and the lead kept falling out. Those were the two reasons I bought it so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't read it
customer_reviews.text: I never used the drawing feature because I discovered that I had trouble reading the tape right off the bat. 32nd marks might be needed occasionally, but on both sides of the tape? It seemed to be a nice wide tape, and if they had 16ths on one side I might have been alright with it. I'll admit that my eyes aren't the greatest, but even with glasses, the markings just made it too difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Klenk

customer_reviews.title: Best marking tape measure out...oh well good tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Love the quick draw ability makes qauter round marking and cutting quick and easy which makes me... i mean my boss more money and production. Everyone on my jobsite loves the tape measure even the old wheelchair bound framing carpenter larry has find joy in such a product. And yes larry is real dont ask me how he does it but he does larry uses an acorn lift to install rafters
customer_reviews.author: Rougecarpenter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool idea ... but will it stand the test of time?
customer_reviews.text: ASk me again a few years from now. Right now its a fun gadget to show my buddies. And, it was cheap enough, so what the heck. I'm just an occasional user, so a review from a pro would be interesting.
customer_reviews.author: W. Scott

customer_reviews.title: but he is sure he will continue to be happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this QUICKDRAW PRO self marking 25' tape for my husband. He really likes it. Hasn't had enough time to use it much, but he is sure he will continue to be happy with it. Thank you Amazon for selling this on-line. It came quickly to us also.
customer_reviews.author: Karonjoyce

customer_reviews.title: 16' Foot QUICKDRAW PRO Self Marking Tape Measure
customer_reviews.text: Good product (the metal tape is weak doesn't stand more than 9') Not sure if I would buy it again, and recommend it to anyone who's looking for something like this especially for this low price. Pencil in the tape is brilliant idea I would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Laczko Studio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool idea and works well enough for me. I'm using it to mark downspouts in the gutter business. The only thing I don't like is the bulkiness for a 16' and the hook doesn't jut out far enough to easily hook things without pulling it out manually first.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With this product, I don't need try to find where is my pencil when I mark the demensions
customer_reviews.author: Jinpeng Wang

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down
customer_reviews.text: After two uses the tape did not draw back. It got stuck and could not be put back into the dispenser. Literally had to throw it in the garbage. Never fell or got banged up so this boggled my mind. Definitely would not invest in this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Eddie J. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Definitely handy!
customer_reviews.text: Another stocking stuffer for my hubby for the win! This thing is handy. My hubby is so used to stealing pencils from inside I had to remind him of the built in graphite marker a couple of times. But now he's so used to it when he grabs a different tape measure he's peeved when he has to stop and go steal another pencil from inside. It's such a small thing but it really is super convenient to have!
customer_reviews.author: KCKENDRICK

customer_reviews.title: I have not used this item yet but did test ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this item yet but did test it and it is exactly does what it says. My wife got this for me for Fathers Day and I am excited to find a project to use it on.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea and I would have given 5 stars but I almost cut my finger trying to get it out of the packaging. Also it is not real clear how to refill the lead. Maybe it was written somewhere that was destroyed while trying to free it from the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good idea, but it is not executed well. The tape is good quality, but the added marking feature makes it a little clunky, and it still doesn't mark well. Integration of a miniature mechanical pencil would work better and add less bulk than the wheel system used.
customer_reviews.author: R Bull

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest most expensive tape measure I've ever bought. The belt clip broke off the first time I cloned into my truck with it on. It's now useless and because I waited to try it out, it's past the return period so I'm stuck with this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bought and don't/won't use
customer_reviews.text: This item looked like a gimmick and it is. Very clunky in size and shape. Not very easy to read the marker line to know where the graphite line will be. Graphite line not really accurate depending on how you move the tape it makes an arc of a line if moved too much.
customer_reviews.author: jeff gers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tape measure. lock works well and makes very nice line. If they had a hole at the one inch mark you could put nail or other sharp object in hole and make radius.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Tape retracted in itself and RIPPED!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice measuring tape I used it a couple times while building a chicken coop, my only complaint is when I let the tape retract on itself it caught on the side of the frame and at first made a little tear in the tape, eventually it has ripped a chunk out, would really like to see what I could do to get this fixed but couldn’t get in contact with the seller if I could fix this I would give it a five star
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Robertson

customer_reviews.title: innovative and useless but it needs auto-lock.
customer_reviews.text: I like how innovative it is but come-on use a better material or design to unlock and lock it's so hard to press down on it- I can rarely lock it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Really cool concept and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really cool concept and very easy to use. And even cooler, it comes with a refill that will last you for 20,000 marks. No more looking for that Pencil only to find it once I sit down!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tape measure for my husband for Christmas since he is a contractor. I was looking forward to him using it because of the graphite marker. The lead won't load after a month of use and the tape is already chipped and is slicing up his fingers. We are very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krista T

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy tape measurer
customer_reviews.text: Found this to be incredibly addicting!!! I made marks on any and every surface, before wrapping it for a present! OCD and keeper of sanity when doing handy woman chores, you gotta snatdhc
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as gifts. The tape it self is great and very easy to read. One however wouldn't accept the marking lead and make contact with the marking wheel. Therefore it will not mark as intended. If working as intended I consider the tape would rate five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Does what you bought it for
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say, but the self marking help more that I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brcka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Idea
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely for more quickly marking boards to the same length. I would buy a longer, wide tape framer carpenter version with more standout if you decide to make one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hackman

customer_reviews.title: I admit the concept is great. However
customer_reviews.text: I admit the concept is great. However, the build of this tape is flimsy and it broke within a week of use. Maybe a great tool for your DIY weekend warrior. But if you're like me and in the trades for a living. I'd look for a sturdier model.
customer_reviews.author: paul espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Tape
customer_reviews.text: Good Tape measure very accurate love all the features I just wish it was a little stronger. Dropped it once and broke the part the lead feeds into and had to straighten out the line reader.

customer_reviews.text: Tape broke after using twice, and now my return window has just closed. Not a happy customer! The lines also did not draw dark enough. You could barely see them when marking with it.

customer_reviews.text: Great tape measure and very durable. Love the fact that it comes with extra lead. It did bend at 6ft but maybe it was the way I was holding it. Marks the wood really nice.

customer_reviews.text: Works just the way it was described. Makes things a whole lot easier. Very sturdy and easy to read

I found the graphite pencil feature less accurate than using a tape measure designed to be marked on with the pencil like the Stanley version. The build quality just isn't there. I've never had a tape measure break like that in all my years of building. I wouldn't recommend this product

product_meta.title: 25' Foot QUICKDRAW PRO Self Marking Tape Measure - 1st Measuring Tape with a Built in Pencil - Contractor Grade Steel Tape - 25 Foot Power Locking Tape Ruler
product_meta.description:
Style:25' Measuring TapeThe QUICKDRAW PRO Tape Measure is the FASTEST, most ACCURATE measuring device in the construction industry today. The patented graphite marking system comes preloaded and ready to mark. The internal steel wheel easily and accurately applies a graphite mark/line right where you want it. DON’T WASTE ANYMORE TIME LOOKING FOR OR SHARPENING A PENCIL! 

BETTER, FASTER, STRONGER The New QUICKDRAW PRO Tape Measure is the next evolution of the original QUICKDRAW DIY (w/black casing). Every feature has been upgraded to meet the demands of the professional contractor, and to help the weekend warrior build like a PRO. 

LOSE YOUR PENCIL QUICKDRAW PRO makes 2000+ marks (1/4”) per load. Reloading takes only 10 seconds. Refills are available on Amazon. 

MAKE NO MISTAKE By acting exactly like a gun sight, the new (patent pending) wedge indicator gives you extreme accuracy. From the front, it’s a wedge shape, but look down from above and the wedge become a single red line that tells you precisely where you’re putting your mark. The Tru-VIEW WEDGE ensures dead nuts accuracy every time. 

DRAW CIRCLES AROUND THE COMPETITION Want to cut an 8” hole? No Problem. Simply lock your tape blade at 4”, hold the corner of the tape hook on your center point and draw your circle (see the QUICKDRAW PRO video for example). Making a radius is so simple now, what used to take minutes now only takes seconds with QUICKDRAW PRO. 

LOCK IT UP TIGHT The new heavy duty brake-lock is made of a composite rubber that grips the blade from top and bottom to securely lock the tape blade, resulting in the most accurate marks, lines and radius’ in the industry. 

CLIP N’ GO Our belt clip is made of heavy gauge spring steel with an industrial chrome finish. It’s almost indestructible. Now you can feel secure knowing that your tape measure is always by your side. 

WEATHER THE STORM QUICKDRAW PRO dominates all industry durability tests. A hurricane would struggle to damage this tape. “What about the rain?” you ask - QUICKDRAW is your best friend when working with damp, or even dripping wet lumber. You will get an extra dark line on wet lumber and almost all other wet materials.
